title: Police: Accidental shooting kills man
content:
WILMINGTON, NC (WECT) -
A man died as a result of an accidental shooting in Wilmington early Wednesday morning.
Wilmington Police initially thought the shooting was suicide but ultimately determined it was accidental.
New Hanover County dispatch received a call about a victim with a gunshot wound to the head around 12:45 a.m. in the 300 block of Grass Lane.
Police on scene said the victim was a man, possibly in his late teens or early 20s, but a medical examiner will do an autopsy.
There were other people in the home at the time but no one else was injured.
It is unclear what events led to the shooting.
